desc: SANADROP WC3 does the equivalent of: Waste cleaner, Ammonia inhibitor, Algae controller, Water clarifier and Combats Cyanobacteria. It is a super concentrated biostimulant, this unique proprietary aquarium product replaces multiple products saving you maintenance and money.

layout.text: is a biostimulant that will significantly reduce the necessity to clean your tank and change the water
